groups.label: Moves whose own type changes
groups.description: Moves that can become a different type based on items, forms, terrain, weather, or other conditions.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect_summary: Type determined by user's IVs (Gen II–VII).

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.effect_summary: Type & power depend on held Berry; Berry is consumed.

moves.name: Judgment
moves.effect_summary: Type depends on held Plate. With Legend Plate (LA), changes to a type effective vs target.

moves.name: Techno Blast
moves.effect_summary: Type depends on Genesect's held Drive (Fire/Water/Ice/Electric).

moves.name: Multi-Attack
moves.effect_summary: Type depends on Silvally's held Memory (any type).

moves.name: Weather Ball
moves.effect_summary: Becomes Fire/Water/Ice/Rock in weather; Normal otherwise.

moves.name: Terrain Pulse
moves.effect_summary: Becomes Electric/Psychic/Grass/Fairy on terrain; Normal otherwise.

moves.name: Revelation Dance
moves.effect_summary: Matches the user's current primary type (edge-cases with Roost/Burn Up/Double Shock).

moves.name: Tera Blast
moves.effect_summary: When user is Terastallized, becomes the user's Tera Type; also switches to higher attacking stat.

moves.name: Tera Starstorm
moves.effect_summary: When used by Terapagos (Stellar Form), becomes Stellar-type; also deals super-effective damage to Terastallized targets.

moves.name: Ivy Cudgel
moves.effect_summary: Ogerpon-only: type depends on held Mask (Grass/Water/Fire/Rock). Others: always Grass.

moves.name: Aura Wheel
moves.effect_summary: Morpeko-only: Electric in Full Belly; Dark in Hangry.

moves.name: Raging Bull
moves.effect_summary: Tauros-only nuance: type depends on Paldean form (Fighting/Fire/Water). Others: Normal.

groups.label: Moves that change the user’s typing
groups.description: Moves that alter the user's types, which in turn affects STAB and how opponents hit it.

moves.name: Camouflage
moves.effect_summary: User's type becomes terrain/environment-dependent.

moves.name: Conversion
moves.effect_summary: User becomes the type of the move in its first slot (Gen II+); Gen I: target's type(s).

moves.name: Conversion 2
moves.effect_summary: User changes to a type that resists or is immune to the last move that hit it.

moves.name: Reflect Type
moves.effect_summary: User copies target's current type(s), including added types from Forest's Curse/Trick-or-Treat.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect_summary: User temporarily loses Flying type for the rest of the turn (pure Flying becomes Normal/typeless by gen).

moves.name: Burn Up
moves.effect_summary: User loses Fire type after use (fails if not Fire).

moves.name: Double Shock
moves.effect_summary: User loses Electric type after use (fails if not Electric).

groups.label: Moves that change the target’s typing
groups.description: Moves that replace or add types on the target, changing how it takes damage.

moves.name: Soak
moves.effect_summary: Target becomes pure Water.

moves.name: Magic Powder
moves.effect_summary: Target becomes pure Psychic.

moves.name: Trick-or-Treat
moves.effect_summary: Adds Ghost to target (can create triple typing).

moves.name: Forest's Curse
moves.effect_summary: Adds Grass to target (can create triple typing).

groups.label: Effects that change move types on the fly
groups.description: Effects that convert the type of moves for a turn or for a specific target.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.effect_summary: Target's next move becomes Electric for the turn.

moves.name: Ion Deluge
moves.effect_summary: For the rest of the turn, all Normal-type moves become Electric.

moves.name: Plasma Fists
moves.effect_summary: After it hits, all Normal-type moves become Electric for the rest of that turn.

groups.label: Moves with custom effectiveness rules
groups.description: These override or augment the standard type chart multipliers.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.effect_summary: Always super effective against Water (2×), despite being Ice.

moves.name: Flying Press
moves.effect_summary: Calculates effectiveness as if Fighting and Flying simultaneously.

moves.name: Tar Shot
moves.effect_summary: Doubles Fire-type effectiveness against the target (and lowers Speed).

groups.label: Grounding & immunity-removal effects
groups.description: Moves that remove specific immunities or ground targets, changing what hits them.

moves.name: Thousand Arrows
moves.effect_summary: Hits ungrounded foes (Flying/Levitate/etc.), deals neutral to Flying then grounds them.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.effect_summary: Grounds the target until it switches; removes Magnet Rise/Telekinesis.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.effect_summary: All Pokémon become grounded for 5 turns; Ground immunities (Flying/Levitate/etc.) removed.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.effect_summary: Removes Ghost immunity to Normal/Fighting; also ignores evasion boosts.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.effect_summary: Removes Ghost immunity to Normal/Fighting; also ignores evasion boosts.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.effect_summary: Removes Dark immunity to Psychic; also ignores evasion boosts.
